entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
